alert.note: Alert for Allen; Logan; Simpson; Warren (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 10 at 1:56AM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM CDT EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of south central Kentucky including Logan, Allen, Simpson and Warren counties. * WHEN...Until 400 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1254 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bowling Green, Russellville, Scottsville, Plum Springs, Memphis Junction, Crestmoor, Mount Victor, Anderson, Franklin, and Auburn. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
